title: World-Class South Carolina Riverfront Luxury with Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course
description: Warm southern hospitality is the cherry on top of the five-star Montage Palmetto Bluff, a world-class inn resting on the banks of the scenic May River in South Carolinaâ€™s Lowcountry.
